name: Frim Fram Jibble Jam
description:
Made for the Brackey's Jam 2023

Behold, fellow seekers of the absurd! Feast your eyes upon Frim Fram Jibble Jam, a fantastical fusion of mini-games that will take you on a whimsical journey through a world of utter nonsense. But beware, for time is of the essence! Gather as many Frim Frams as you can before the clock strikes zero and your chance at victory is lost forever! Play the game now and see just how many Frim Frams you can collect before time runs out! Let's Jam!

But don't take my word for it, just look at all of these happy gamers!

"Frim Fram Jibble Jam is the game equivalent of a wild fever dream. It's nonsensical, bizarre, and absolutely hilarious. I had a blast playing it!" - Professor Muffinbottoms, PhD in Silly Studies.

"I've never laughed so hard while playing a game before! Frim Fram Jibble Jam is a masterpiece of absurdity, and I can't wait to see what this developer comes up with next." - Sir Wigglesworth III, Professional Giggle Enthusiast.

"This game is bananas! B-A-N-A-N-A-S! If you're looking for a game that will leave you scratching your head and grinning like a fool, Frim Fram Jibble Jam is the one for you." - Queenie Quirky, Ruler of the Nonsense Kingdom.

"I've never felt so simultaneously confused and delighted while playing a game. Frim Fram Jibble Jam is a work of art - or maybe it's just a work of something else entirely. Either way, I loved it!" - Captain Quirk, Intergalactic Eccentric Explorer.

"I've been looking for a game that's as weird and wonderful as I am, and Frim Fram Jibble Jam exceeded all my expectations. I can't stop playing it, and I don't want to!" - Lady Quibbleton, Self-Proclaimed Oddball Extraordinaire.

Controls

----

Arrow keys, space, and sometimes the mouse. Easy peasy.
